comments.comments_text: A quickly taken corner by Manchester City.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A quickly taken corner by [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: There's an opportunity for Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) to deliver the ball into the box from a corner.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: There's an opportunity for [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) to deliver the ball into the box from a corner.

comments.comments_text: Michael Dean shows a yellow card to David Silva (Manchester City) for his blatant foul.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Michael [PLAYER]an shows a yellow card to [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) for his blatant foul.

comments.comments_text: Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) puts a dangerous cross into the box, but the corner is cleared by the first man.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) puts a dangerous cross into the box, but the corner is cleared by the first man.

comments.comments_text: Corner kick. Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) is ready to send the ball into the box.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: Corner kick. [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is ready to send the ball into the box.

comments.comments_text: Harry Maguire (Leicester) will have to be careful for the rest of the match as he is shown a yellow card.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) will have to be careful for the rest of the match as he is shown a yellow card.

comments.comments_text: David Silva (Manchester City) whips the ball in, but it fails to reach any of his teammates as the opposition's defence averts the threat. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. Manchester City will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) whips the ball in, but it fails to reach any of his teammates as the opposition's defence averts the threat. The referee and his assistant both point at the corner flag. [TEAM] will have an opportunity to threaten the opposition's goal.

comments.comments_text: Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) sends a wonderful cross from the corner kick. However, the defence works perfectly to clear the ball and avert the threat.

comments.comments_text: A fine lofted pass into the box, sent by Raheem Sterling (Manchester City), is intercepted by the opposition's defence. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to Manchester City.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: A fine lofted pass into the box, sent by [PLAYER] ([TEAM]), is intercepted by the opposition's defence. The referee and one of his assistants signal for a corner kick to [TEAM].

comments.comments_text: Manchester City take the corner, but their hopes of scoring a goal end with a nice clearance by the defence.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [TEAM] take the corner, but their hopes of scoring a goal end with a nice clearance by the defence.

comments.comments_text: Vincent Kompany (Manchester City) takes out his opponent with a nasty challenge and is relieved when the referee only gives him a booking.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes out his opponent with a nasty challenge and is relieved when the referee only gives him a booking.

comments.comments_text: The corner from Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) is cleared away by the defence.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The corner from [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) is cleared away by the defence.

comments.comments_text: Phil Foden goes off the pitch and Leroy Sane (Manchester City) comes on.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] goes off the pitch and [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) comes on.

comments.comments_text: Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) takes the corner kick and sends the ball among a huddle of players inside the penalty area, but one of the defenders clears it to safety.

comments.comments_text: The resulting set piece from Manchester City is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The resulting set piece from [TEAM] is comfortably intercepted by one of the defending players.

comments.comments_text: What a beautiful moment! Vincent Kompany (Manchester City) got to the ball and unleashed a strong shot from distance. It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way into the top right corner. Kasper Schmeichel just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 1:0.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: What a beautiful moment! [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) got to the ball and unleashed a strong shot from distance. It turned out to be a good decision as his effort found its way into the top right corner. [PLAYER] just shakes his head in disbelief. The score changes to 1:0.

comments.comments_text: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and Harvey Barnes (Leicester) comes onto the pitch so that Youri Tielemans can be given a rest.
comments.comments_text_anonymized: The referee signals that it is time for a substitution and [PLAYER] ([TEAM]) comes onto the pitch so that [PLAYER] can be given a rest.

comments.comments_text: Here is a change. James Maddison is going off and Brendan Rodgers gives the last tactical orders to Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester).

comments.comments_text: Manchester City failed to take advantage of the corner as the opposition's defence was alert and averted the threat.

comments.comments_text: Ilkay Gundogan (Manchester City) lifts the ball into the box from the corner, but one of the defending players gets there first to head it clear.

comments.comments_text: The referee allows time for a substitution. Marc Albrighton will be replaced by Demarai Gray (Leicester).

comments.comments_text: Pep Guardiola has decided to substitute Sergio Aguero and he is replaced by Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City).

comments.comments_text: Gabriel Jesus (Manchester City) has tested the patience of referee Michael Dean and goes into the book for a previous late challenge.

comments.comments_text: This yellow card was deserved. The tackle by Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester) was quite harsh and Michael Dean didn't hesitate to show him a yellow card.
